table.name: vtiger_comisionsatelites
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_comisionsatelites` ( `comisionsatelitesid` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `accountid` INT(19) DEFAULT NULL, `tipodecomisionid` INT(19) DEFAULT NULL, `tipodeformula` VARCHAR(128) DEFAULT NULL, `base` DECIMAL(25,3) DEFAULT NULL, `activa` VARCHAR(5) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`comisionsatelitesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_comisionsatelitescf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_comisionsatelitescf` ( `comisionsatelitesid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`comisionsatelitesid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
